fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Bite someone at night, converting them to another faction of your choice. This will only functionally affect their goal.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may not target the same person more than once.
- If you convert someone to a faction with no other members, they gain Basic defense.
- If you attempt to convert someone to a faction they're already in, you will suicide from vampire guilt.
- You can't convert people to the Neutral faction.
- Conversion immune.
- Upon winning, you may post pictures of grapes in announcements. If you post anything besides grapes, your win is revoked and you die and lose the game.
